content: sea littles is worked in the normal overlay mosaic row by row technique this free pattern of little baby sea creatures can be used in any project you fancy you could add these to your current project or you could make a blanket or cushion cover with any of the patterns as this is a completely free pattern i haven t given any yarn stats but you can use any yarn and corresponding hook you like ********************************************************* the pdf has 6 easy-to-read charts and corresponding written instructions * little crab * little seahorse * little octopus * little fishy * little lobster * little turtle two pdfs are available - one using us terms and one using uk terms ******************************************************* please do share your creations online and tag #getyerhookon and #sealittles happy crocheting abi
